Silence::

"Don't trust that idea fully sir.  No parasite, if this truely a
parasite, can function on it's own without a host. Or it may take
something from the host to sustain it's own life.  Or this could be a
simple case of possession. I recall rumors of such things from a
monestary somewhere up in the regeon of Kulnary 7. But I digress. OK,
so let's try to communicate with it first. If it is sentiant, it may
be reasonable."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus:
> 
> "this... Sedna, it was the name that she call herself, said that she
was some how controling her in thaty way that Nighlight is uncounceus
what's goin on around her while this allien was using her body, if I
remember rightly she demanded a blank protophorm, I guess that she
desire to have her own body"sighed ROdimus while hetouched glenty
Nighlight's hand and looked her "perhaps we could use that to remove
it without risk Nighlight's  life"
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: CatMaster o 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Wednesday, June 01, 2005 10:37 AM
>   Subject: Re: Silence is golden
> 
> 
>   "The med bay is this way."  Kenzo lead Silence to the Maximal's
>   medical facility where (I suppose) Nightlight was being detained. 
>   Several moniters were keeping track of her stats.
> 
>   "The alian life form I'm afraid has infested her spark."  He explained
>   motioning to a moniter that showed her spark on it.  
>   "It will take delicate work to remove it without causing damage to
>   Nightlight."
